channel.title: 194 Look-A-Like - Amnesia
channel.description:
[center][size=40pt]Amnesia[/size][/center]
This thread is all about recreating the RS2-Beta feeling now. I've dropped this project, if you'd like the download link to the source, PM me I won't be releasing it to the server download's section.
[u]Updates list[/u] Beard bug fixed. Running. Smite added to prayer book, Icon above head and affect. (Wasn't in 194 but I wanted it added.) A start of the woodcutting and firemaking skill. Somewhat of a Player vs Monster combat system & hitmarks. (Hitmarks are extremely ugly to me because I made them myself, but its something easily fixed..) Basic emotes added. Eating & Hitpoint healing. Teleport gfx. Combat level in combat tab, (Also wasn't in 194 but I wanted it, also it shows a steel Battle Axe for weapon still aswell I've steel yet to add level requirements for weapons). Weapon currently wielded is now the weapon that will appear in the combat tab. - [color=black]8/5/11[/color] Correct weapon requirements from Bronze weapons - Rune Weapons added. - [color=black]8/5/11[/color] Cooks Assistant Quest added/halfway, (few bugs considering there are a few things I've yet to add that are required for the quest). - 8/6/11 Fletching skill started - 8/6/11 Firemaking skill finished first complete skill(as close as it can ever get) - 8/7/11 Fatigue added (Doesn't actually work, also I don't believe it did anything in beta either only in classic) - 8/7/11 5 Minute inactivity loggout added - 8/7/11 [u]All[/u] doors around lumbridge, and varrock open.- 8/7/11 All doors around falador now open. - 8/7/11 "Combat level:" in Combat Tab has now been changed to " Choose Attack Style". - 8/7/11 Switching attack styles in combat tab now works. - 8/7/11 Basic PvP system added (both hit at the same time). - 8/7/11 Fletching skill finished, second skill completed (as close at it will get) - 8/8/11 Cooking skill started - 8/8/11 Cooking skill finished - 8/10/11
[u]Now some media of what I've added.[/u] [img]http://i1040.photobucket.com/albums/b401/AcornsTheName1/Untitledd.png?t=1312604975[/img]
Feel free to comment below about what you think of it and what updates could possibly be added in the future.

item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Its winerlove…
EDIT: BETA Testing is released tomorrow for all who join.
Website with webclient will be released on the date of the beta release.

TheHolyGrail:

Uhh… why does it show a iron battle axe and say “Weapon: Rune Sword” in the last picture?

It’s a bug in the 194 look-a-like.

@Acorn

I said it has been done, I never mentioned I did it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:25, topic:408486”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=509767.msg3699596#msg3699596 date=1312665056]

Wow, looks good so far Acorn. I like how you can barely see the characters eyes and that’s about it. No other facial features to speak of.

I’m not sure if this is sarcasm or not to be honest, but thank you lol.
[/quote]

First part was serious, second part was sarcasm[/quote]

Hahah, that’s just the way it was in the 194 revision.

Read full topic

item.title: 194 Look-A-Like - Amnesia
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

TheHolyGrail:

Uhh… why does it show a iron battle axe and say “Weapon: Rune Sword” in the last picture?

Its a bug in the source I downloaded, I’ve already fixed it but that picture is old.

Smite wasn't around in #194...
Read my post actually, don't just look at my pictures. Its plainly written that I said I know smite wasn't in the 194 revision but I wanted it added, so I did.
Wow, looks good so far Acorn. I like how you can barely see the characters eyes and that's about it. No other facial features to speak of.
I'm not sure if this is sarcasm or not to be honest, but thank you lol.
[quote]Better more remakes than fucking PI's or Delta's.[/quote]

Pretty sure this is delta based.

Goodluck, and adrians wasn’t a leech bro, he was showing pics of what was on the server already. It’s called a project, he isn’t going to have a bunch of his own features right when he starts rofl.


This is not delta or PI, also the reason I say Adrian’s is a leech is not because of his pictures but what he says hes “done” already.
Hes done nothing but added running everything else he said he added was already in his source which is called leeching which I’m not a fan of supporting.
Unless he makes his own framework of course.

OT: Good luck with the development, be sure to check back into this thread after a while, don’t quit on this mate.


Thank you, also I won’t be quitting this anytime soon you can be assured I might possibly take a week break from it in the near future to finish up my current development but that’s about it.

Read full topic

item.title: 194 Look-A-Like - Amnesia
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Froggg, post:18, topic:408486”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=509767.msg3698976#msg3698976 date=1312616522]

and so is playing a rsps over runescape.

Read the thread before you post, I already mentioned that. RuneScape is shit now, thus not very fun. If you find a decent RSPS it can be a lot more fun. While your comment seems to be related, it’s actually not at all. There’s two completely different reasonings behind them.
[/quote]

facepalm nevermind…[/quote]

God damn I hate ignorant people like you. The reason behind RSPS is to have fun, since RuneScape is no longer fun. So the difference between a RSPS and RuneScape is… Fun. :hurr:

The difference between a 194 look-a-like and a real 194 isn’t fun. They can equally fun. The difference is just that one’s a cheap-knock off and less impressive. RSPS are knock-offs as well, the difference being they’re more fun than the original. That’s not the case here (depending on who made them and how they were made).

I suggest you leave before you make yourself look even more ignorant.

Read full topic

item.title: 194 Look-A-Like - Amnesia
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:10, topic:408486”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=509767.msg3698917#msg3698917 date=1312612340]

As far as I know, this and 1 other 194 Server is currently in development on Mopar, as well the other one being a total leech.
Also for making a real 194 Server, I have no interest in doing so.

No interest in being one of the first to do something cool instead of doing a cheap knock-off of it?

Well okay then, good luck I guess.

Like playing RSPS instead of playing the real thing?
This is a side project for now, if how ever I decide I’d like to stick with this project then that’s certainly a possibility.
I’d just like to see more 194’s (look-a-likes at best) out there and that’s precisely what I’m trying to accomplish with this.

See now that’s different. RuneScape sucks now, so if you find a decent RSPS it’s more fun.

No difference with the 194 look a like and 194 other than one’s just a cheap knock-off and much less impressive.
[/quote]
That’s where you contradict yourself, If somebody is able to make a decent look-a-like then it can be just as fun.[/quote]

I never said it wouldn’t be just as fun. I simply said it would just be a cheap knock-off and less impressive.

Read full topic
